text: Click here to read the patch notes for v.248 - MapleStory X KONOSUBA.

title: [Completed] Unscheduled Maintenance - March 8th, 2024
text: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 2 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: What's Your MapleStory? - Euri
text: We take a look at some of the great stories that our players have had. Although I don't play as much these days, my most enjoyable moment about the game will always be the community of friends that I made along the way.

title: KONOSUBA Community Contests and Events
text: Take a look at the new and upcoming Community Contests below. The MapleStory Community Team runs a number of contests and events throughout the year, challenging the in-game skill and real-world creativity of Maplers all around the world!

title: Check Out the February 2024 Art Corner
text: Look at this month's roundup of our favorite fan art!

title: v.248 Update Preview - MapleStory X KONOSUBA
text: Join Community Managers Veeraah and Jade in the next Community Livestream. MapleStory X KONOSUBA stream where they'll explore the explosive new KONOSUBA content!

title: v.248 - Strawberry Farm Festival Update Preview
text: Welcome to the Strawberry Farm Festival! In addition to helping Spiegelette with her farm, explore new events and the redesigned server selection screen!

title: Upcoming Website Refresh and News Post Changes
text: Within the next several weeks, the MapleStory website will be revamped, however some older news posts will not be migrated to the new website.
